https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/elAFsYNNlkgCDO8s56aSblN1PWY.jpg The movie tells the real-life love story of Lt. Col. Lee Cheng-liang, a high profile Indigenous Defense Fighter (IDF) jet pilot, and his visually impaired wife, who are played by Taiwanese actor Bryant Chang and actress Tiffany Hsu, respectively. Dream Flight
